title: JWT Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can authenticate successfully with valid JWT and roles are assigned correctly with token refresh functionality.

steps.description: Send login request with valid credentials
Receive valid JWT token with correct role information
Use JWT token to access protected resource
Access is granted based on role
Wait for JWT token expiry and trigger token refresh
Token refresh returns a new valid token without requiring re-login

title: JWT Authentication Failure with Invalid Token
description: Ensure access is denied when JWT token is missing, malformed, or expired.

steps.description: Send request without JWT token to protected endpoint
Access is denied with proper error code (401 Unauthorized)
Send request with malformed or expired JWT token
Access is denied with proper error code and descriptive message

title: WebRTC Video Call Establishment
description: Verify that client can initiate and establish a WebRTC video call with staff including proper SDP and ICE candidate exchanges through Socket.IO.

steps.description: Client initiates video call to staff member
Socket.IO signaling events for call initiate are sent
Staff receives incoming call notification and accepts
SDP offer/answer and ICE candidates are exchanged correctly
Peer connection is established and video streams flow on both ends

title: WebRTC Video Call Decline and Timeout Handling
description: Validate that calls can be declined by staff and that unanswered calls time out correctly on client side.

steps.description: Client initiates video call to staff member
Staff declines the incoming call
Client receives call decline notification and call is terminated
Client initiates video call to staff member
If staff does not respond within timeout period, client receives timeout event and call ends

title: Real-time Audio Recognition with Multi-language Speech-to-Text
description: Test real-time microphone audio capture, PCM encoding, streaming to Google Gemini AI, and receiving accurate speech-to-text in multiple supported languages.

steps.description: Grant microphone permission and start audio capture
Audio PCM data packets are generated and streamed to AI endpoint
Speak in supported languages (English, Telugu, Hindi, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam)
Receive transcriptions with correct language detection and confidence scores

title: Multi-language Text-to-Speech Output
description: Verify TTS functionality with language-specific voice synthesis for supported languages.

steps.description: Request text-to-speech output for sample texts in each supported language
Audio output plays with correct language voice and reasonable clarity

title: Staff Faculty Timetable Update and Validation
description: Ensure staff can update their timetable with validation that verifies workload limits and prevents schedule conflicts, propagating changes in real time via Socket.IO.

steps.description: Staff edits their timetable to add new schedule entry
System validates workload and detects conflicts, preventing invalid entries
Staff submits valid timetable changes
Updated timetable propagates in real time to all relevant clients via Socket.IO

title: Faculty Availability Natural Language Query
description: Validate that users can query faculty availability using natural language with fuzzy matching for names and receive accurate, real-time schedule info.

steps.description: User submits natural language query about faculty availability (e.g., 'Is Professor Smith available tomorrow?')
System interprets query, performs fuzzy matching on names, and returns correct availability status
Submit queries with misspelled or partial faculty names
System still matches faculty correctly and provides availability results

title: Campus Location Navigation with Floor Maps
description: Test navigation feature which matches user input to campus locations, supports floor maps, and displays valid directions.

steps.description: User enters location query or selects from directory
System matches location accurately including floor level
Navigation UI displays detailed directions and floor map highlighting correct path

title: Staff Directory with Skill-based Filtering and Availability Tracking
description: Verify that staff directory displays correct profiles, supports filtering by skills, and reflects real-time availability status.

steps.description: Open staff directory
All staff profiles load with correct information
Apply skill-based filters
Directory updates to show only staff matching selected skills
Availability statuses update in real-time from staff availability data

title: Real-time Notifications Delivery and Synchronization
description: Ensure real-time notifications are created, delivered via Socket.IO, and synchronized across multiple user devices with read/unread states updated correctly.

steps.description: Generate notification event for call, meeting, or task
Socket.IO delivers notification to all connected devices of user immediately
User marks notification as read on one device
Read state updates and synchronizes on all other devices in real time

title: AI Chat Assistant Query Response
description: Validate AI assistant powered by Google Gemini AI responds appropriately to common campus-related queries and general questions.

steps.description: User types common campus-related question into AI chat (e.g., 'Where is the language lab?')
Assistant responds with correct and relevant information
User asks general knowledge question
Assistant provides coherent and contextually accurate answer

title: Device Permission Workflow and Error Handling
description: Test camera and microphone permission prompts, device selection UI, and proper handling when permission is denied or revoked.

steps.description: User accesses audio/video features for the first time
Permission prompts display correctly for camera and microphone
User denies permission for microphone
Application gracefully handles denial and displays informative message
User selects among multiple available devices
Selected device is correctly activated and used for capture

title: Server Health Check and UI Readiness Feedback
description: Verify that server status endpoints accurately report health and readiness, preventing premature API calls and providing UI connectors with appropriate feedback.

steps.description: Request health check endpoint from client UI
Server reports healthy status when ready
Simulate server health degradation or unavailability
UI disables critical API calls and shows visual feedback about server readiness

title: Encoding and BOM Prevention in Build
description: Validate that encoding fixes prevent BOM-related build errors and enforce UTF-8 encoding via editor configs and scripts.

steps.description: Build the project with files containing potential BOM
Build completes without BOM-related errors
Verify editorconfig and pre-commit scripts enforce UTF-8 encoding on files
Source files comply with UTF-8 encoding rule

title: API Rate Limiting Enforcement
description: Ensure API endpoints correctly apply rate limiting to prevent abusive requests, returning proper error codes when limits are exceeded.

steps.description: Send high volume of requests exceeding rate limit to API endpoint
Server responds with rate limiting error codes (e.g., 429 Too Many Requests)
Further requests within limit succeed normally

title: Error Handling and Logging for Critical Components
description: Verify that failures in critical paths are caught, logged for debugging, and user-friendly error messages are presented.

steps.description: Trigger error scenarios in backend API and frontend UI (e.g., network failures, invalid input)
Error details are logged securely on server
Frontend displays clear and helpful error messages without exposing sensitive info

title: Backend API, WebRTC, Socket Events, and State Management Coverage
description: Confirm extensive test coverage exists validating backend API endpoints, WebRTC call flows, Socket.IO events, and front-end state management logic.

steps.description: Run automated test suites for backend API, WebRTC signaling, and frontend state stores
Tests complete successfully with coverage reports indicating critical areas tested
Edge cases, error states, and typical flows are tested.

title: Fallback Functionality for Optional PostgreSQL Database
description: Ensure system operates seamlessly using the fallback in-memory store when PostgreSQL database is unavailable or disabled.

steps.description: Disable PostgreSQL connection and start backend
Backend falls back to in-memory data store without errors
Perform core operations such as authentication, scheduling, and notifications
Operations succeed and data persists correctly within session

title: Unified Mode Toggle Integration
description: Test that toggling unified mode correctly enables/disables the integrated client-staff-server experience without breaking standalone client functionality.

steps.description: Enable unified mode toggle on the platform
Integrated features such as staff management and real-time updates activate properly
Disable unified mode toggle
Client-only features remain functional and no errors occur from disabled staff/server components
